description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB Mongo user definitions.

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create
commands.summary: Create a Mongo DB user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create --account-name
                                           --body
                                           --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --body @mongo-user-definition.json

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create
commands.summary: Create a Mongo DB user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create --account-name
                                           --body
                                           --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition create --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --body @mongo-user-definition.json

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete
commands.summary: Delete a CosmosDb MongoDb user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete --account-name
                                           --id
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete
commands.summary: Delete a CosmosDb MongoDb user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete --account-name
                                           --id
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--yes]
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition delete --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition exists
commands.summary: Check if an Azure Cosmos DB MongoDb user definition exists.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition exists --account-name
                                           --id
                                           --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition exists --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition exists --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition list
commands.summary: List all MongoDb user definitions under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition list --account-name
                                         --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition list --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

                                         --resource-group

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition show
commands.summary: Show the properties of a MongoDb user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition show --account-name
                                         --id
                                         --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition show --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --id be79875a-2cc4-40d5-8958-566017875b39

commands.name: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition update
commands.summary: Update a MongoDb user definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb mongodb user definition update --account-name
                                           --body
                                           --resource-group
examples: az cosmosdb mongodb user definition update --account-name MyAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup --body @mongo-user-definition.json
